reviews.review: 4/5 JUST because the romantic story arch between Gene and Jailbreak is not fully explored and ended with a satisfying show of their mutual affection for one another. The emoji movie is my life, my soul, my only. Gene x Jailbreak otp for life.
Ok.... um.... Sony Just lost a Big one!!!! Sorry Sony, But just stop now!!

In this post-Freudian age the institution of marriage, as a by-product of religiously-fuelled monogamy, has deteriorated to the point that amorphous sexual identity, as opposed to rigid religiosity, has become the primary self-defining feature of the individual.But has anything changed?Has the entrapment of woman via marriage which Blake called a "gilded cage" merely deteriorated to the "rusty prison" of the Bang Bus, representative of the anonymous male-centric sex and continued subjugation?
This was a really cute movie, it has a really good moral( be who you are no matter what people say), so it is a very good movie to show your children.
It's really boring and altogether meh. There are cliches everywhere and have the most bland jokes in a movie I have ever seen.
bad idea inspired for a bad generation.

I Originally went to see this movie as a joke with my friends, however it was so horrifically bad that it wasn't even funny. It was no joke the worst film I have ever seen. Near the end of the film someone went out to be sick (not kidding) the film is just one big money grab with more product placement than disgraceful disgusting unoriginal storyline. 0.5/100
th emojy mov ehs so gud i came in my UNderwear and i thnk jailbrk is soooiooo secksy
This movie, although including many.... "interesting" jokes, was a work of art.

I personally loved the movie. It was fun to see the apps and emojis that I use on a daily basis brought to life . I recognised a few voices from some of my other favourite shows such as high five (from doctor who) and poop (from American Dad and a few others). The movie had a really great message too. From be who you are to one of my favourite quotes "what good is being number 1 if there aren't any other numbers", the movie was fun and was a great way for me to make my bad day better.
